name: An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade
title: An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade
desc: "Have you noticed them, seen them? The children who wash their little feet in the streams, fishermen laughing beneath the light of the rainbow's arc, the moonlight trysts of lovebirds, their figures painted silver... Humans, too, are creatures of this land. Just how different is their innocence from ours?"

skills.desc: Adventure: Once. If your Adventure Experience is not less than 4, change to deal 1 Physical DMG to your Active Character, and Adventure: Twice.
